alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Ten geographers who think the world is flat will tend to reinforce each other's errors. If they have a private dialect in which to do this, it becomes impossible for outsiders to disagree with them. Only a sailor can set them straight. The last person they want to meet is someone who, freed from the constraints of expertise, has sailed around the world."

- J R Saul, Voltaire's Bastards
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Saul on Groupthink and Specialist Dialects
